items.title: Turn muddy buddies into clean critters
items.guide1: Your pets get dirty if they play in the mud, but you can clean them up with sponges, other cleaning tools or just let them take a dip in the water.
items.guide2: Hopefully, these methods will assist you in improving you level at this game.

items.title: Stack hats on pets and pets on hats
items.guide1: Pets can wear hats, and on top of most hats you can stack a pet … that in turn can wear a hat … and a pet! Pet-hat-stack!

items.title: Bag up that mess
items.guide1: Did your pet do its business? Bag up the poop in a poop bag!

items.title: Turn on the night lights
items.guide1: Give the pet hotel its special night lights by pressing the sun button next to the big red house.

items.title: Create extra-special (or extra-gross) meals
items.guide1: With loads of new pet foods you can make a very creative meal.
items.guide2: Just add whatever food you want and create something extra special! Worm salad? Dog-food sandwich? The possibilities are endless!

items.title: Find fantastical creatures
items.guide1: Have you discovered the strange branch on the tree in the park?
items.guide2: Press it to find eggs that hold a variety of fantastical creatures!

items.title: Dance under a disco ball
items.guide1: Under the radio in the park you can find a wood button popping out of the stem.
items.guide2: Press it to bring down a disco ball and create an instant dance floor.

items.title: Uncover a secret hideout
items.guide1: Press the bushes on the little hill to reveal a hideout to reveal a hiding spot for objects and pets.

items.title: Reveal the secret of the mysterious mushrooms
items.guide1: When you press a little button to the left of the mountain,
items.guide2: mushrooms pop up. What happens if you tap them?

items.title: Special Thanks
items.guide1: Thank you for downloading our app, and we hope it will help you get better in the game :)
